## broader limitations of studies of tonal perception

::: incremental
- small samples of people
- small samples of stimuli
- WEIRD people/stimuli (and often MIDI)
:::


## we want a measure that:

::: incremental
- better construct validity
- more objective
- reduced methods variance
- unbiased for different populations
- scalable (gamifiable)
:::
